review: Unless you are right by your wifi router, it works poorly. Only the prime content works decently but that's only rarely.
author: squigglesmcgiggles

review: The Fire TV Stick exceeding my expectations. It really does work great. I got it as a gift for a relative and they love it.
author: inkblot

review: We love it. Turns our TV into a pretty smart TV!!!
author: bailey

review: Love all the movies, tv shows and music!
author: walstonjam

review: There was an audio delay in several of the apps including YouTube and vevo.  When I googled for a solution many other customers had the same issue but no solution. Returned and switched back to chromecast.
author: Ronald J. Jackson

review: I'm still exploring this device, but so far I'm please.
author: Fernando
